name: Laser Gun
overview: Created by Kevin Myktyn and published as both Laser Gun and Laser Beam in multiple publications such as COMPUTE! 1985/10 (Issue #65), Best of COMPUTE! & Gazette, Digital Marketing PD #016 and in Stonysoft #0343. Move your man to the top lefthand corner of the screen there you can move the laser and shoot the balls.Remember shoot only the ball with the same colour as the border! Grab the ball and bring it to the basket in the right hand corner. Do that with all the balls to win. Watch out for the other balls they will kill you! Good luck
